svg.text: Pesticide Sprayer Robot - Circuit Connection Diagram

g.text: • All GND connections MUST be common (connected together)
• LM2596 output must be adjusted to exactly 5V before connecting
• Remove ENA/ENB jumpers on L298N modules
Pin 2 → IN1 | Pin 3 → IN2 | Pin 5 → ENA
Pin 4 → IN3 | Pin 7 → IN4 | Pin 6 → ENB
